titleStmt.title: To GEORGIANA MORSON,Georgiana Morson, n√©e Collin (1817-80), matron of Urania Cottage (the home for homeless women established by CD), 1849-54: see Pilgrim Letters 5, p. 509n, and Jenny Hartley, Charles Dickens and the House of Fallen Women (London: Methuen, 2009). OCTOBER 1851
titleStmt.bibl: Charles Dickens Letters Project, ed. Leon Litvack, Katie Brandt, Emily Bell, and Jeremy Parrott (London: Dickens Fellowship), DickensLetters.com.

sourceDesc.p: Envelope only. Text from facsimile in International Autograph Auctions online catalogue, Aug 2017.

address.addrLine: Mrs Morson | Urania Cottage | Near The White Horse| Shepherds Bush

dateline.date: PM [day illegible] Oct 1851There are two weak postal cancellations on the recto and verso, of which only Oct 51 can be read.
